lead_paragraph: Hon. DANIEL WEBSTER attended the great State Fair at this place to-day, and was received with every demonstration of enthusiasm, at the public exercises in Hanover-square. Mr. WEBSTER, in reply to the loud calls of the multitude present, made the following address:

headline.main: NEW-HAMPSHIRE.; STATE FAIR AT MANCHESTER. MR. WEBSTER'S SPEECH. By Magnetic Telegraph to The New-York Times.
